titleStmt.title: Anastasis Britannica & Hibernica Great Brittain and Irelands resurrection. Or the happy turn upon his Majesties happy message and happy return. The first part upon occasion of the thanksgiving, May 24. 1660. which was for his Majesties gracious message from beyond seas to the two houses, delivered upon 2 Sam.19.14. And he bowed the heart of all the men of Judah, ... The second part upon occasion of the thanksgiving, June 28. 1660. for His Majesties safe return to His kingdomes, ... By John Bradshaw pastor of Etchingham in Sussex.
titleStmt.author: Bradshaw, John, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Rothwel at the Bear and Fountain in Cheapside in Goldsmiths Row,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
